title: HOUR 1 - Belichick, Patriots-Bills
itunes:title: HOUR 1 - Belichick, Patriots-Bills
description:
Bill Belichick showed his experience last night against the Bills

The Patriots system is simple yet affective

How reporters ask questions is very important


Guest: Mike Silver
